title: Certified Nurses Aid Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 3 days. I interviewed at East Boston Neighborhood Health Center (East Boston, MA) in Jul 2011
Interview Descriptions: Screening with HR over the fine. Meet with director after that for a second interview. They'll tell you if you're hired and you will be asked to come back for training which is paid
Interview Questions: What is your favorite part about working with the elderly

title: Program Interview
Application Type: I applied through other source. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at East Boston Neighborhood Health Center (Boston, MA) in Jan 2011
Interview Descriptions: Pretty casual. Meet with two different people. Arranged interview over phone after email exchange. We discussed my course work and research interests. I took public transportation there to experience the commuting options and that worked out well. Speaking Spanish was an advantage definitely as this community health center served a largely Spanish-speaking population.
Interview Questions: How had your course work prepared you for this position?
